## Experience:
I am an alumni from University of California, Irvine and have had 3+ years in the sustainable non-profit sector where I worked as a project manager in Global Sustainability Research. I have experience in data analysis among several coding languages and platforms such as: R, MATLAB, QGIS, and ArcGIS. 

## Interests:
Some of my favorite hobbies include painting, horseback riding, hiking, and surfing. I enjoy taking care of my plants and my pet snake, Lola.
